themes: perceived disrespect for professional artists by city programs
distinction between professional artists and hobbyists
prioritization of funding for impactful arts nonprofits
importance of supporting arts organizations that provide jobs
key_phrases: the most impactful barrier is the disrespect shown by the City programs towards the idea of professional arts
not everyone is an artist just because they think they are, or do art as a hobby
arts nonprofits who provide jobs for arts professionals and create the greatest impact in the community should be the top priority for public funding
barriers_identified: disrespect by City programs towards professional arts
lack of prioritization for arts nonprofits employing professionals
solutions_proposed: make arts nonprofits that provide jobs for arts professionals and create the greatest impact the top priority for public funding
